nodes.text: The Dark Jedi Enclave was located on the planet Yavin 4. It was the home to two Dark Jedi Sentinels.

Inside the Enclave, there were numerous statues of cloaked Dark Jedi wielding swords, along with symbols and engravings etched into the walls in many places. In one portion of the Enclave there was also a triangular throne with food laid down onto a table in front of it.
Behind the throne, there was also a room similar to the Jedi Council's meeting chamber, with several chairs evenly spaced in a circle around the room.
